scenes.background: You decided to help with the urgent task as you are on annual leave. [Monica] and [Bob] join the conversation.
scenes.description: 'Alright, let's get this sorted then. But honestly, the timing couldn't be worse.' He frowns, checking his watch.

options.text: I know, Bob. Let's tackle this quickly so we can all get back to our plans.
options.analysis: You show high empathy and emotional perception, but the motivation to address the urgency could be higher.

options.text: Well, life happens. Let's just get it done.
options.analysis: You maintain emotional control and motivation, but empathy and social skill could be enhanced.

options.text: I agree, Bob. Timing is off, but we'll manage.
options.analysis: You show good emotional regulation and empathy, but emotional perception could be better.
